nodes.documentation:
Mints a stakable address with the account hash as the token id
Emits transfer event to sender
msg.sender - new account creator
nodes.name: create

nodes.documentation:
Only govenor (the scsc) can burn a BP (because stake needs to be removed)
@param bp the stakee to burn
nodes.name: remove

nodes.documentation: Expose internal exists function to be used
nodes.name: exists

create(address).notice: Mints a stakable address with the account hash as the token id Emits transfer event to sender msg.sender - new account creator
